name: Deflect
description:
Description:

Deflect is a 2D fast-paced ball bouncing game with you controlling the ball and the platform. Try to surpass your high score and earn rewards to unlock a variety of different balls.

Features:
  • Simple 2D art style.
  • Increase speed as you progress.
  • Four different difficulties.
  • Four different pickups.
  • Be in control of everything!
  • 24 different color variety of balls to choose from.

If you have any problem/questions let me know, I'll be happy to answer you!
